mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.username, u.password, u.email, u.phone, u.nickname, u.avatar, u.status, u.email_verified, u.last_login_at, u.created_at, u.updated_at, r.id AS role_id, r.code AS role_code, r.name AS role_name, r.description AS role_description, r.status AS role_status, r.created_at AS role_created_at, r.updated_at AS role_updated_at FROM user u LEFT JOIN user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN role r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE u.id = #{id}
